string.value: Yulete seemed ecstatic to help Keeny out. Then he proceeded to bring out the well-organized blueprint of Frankenroid and told me to tell her if she had any questions, she's more than welcome to ask him herself. I better give this blueprint to #bKeeny#k.
After receiving the blueprint of Frankenroid, Keeny seemed beyond words. She felt like this would really help her make Humanoid A's wish come true.

I apologize for making you wait for so long. Here, please take this. It's the #bBlueprint for Frankenroid#k! This should really help Keeny study the ins and outs of Frankenroid. Can you please give this blueprint to Keeny right now?

I had been wanting to leave my mark in the history of alchemy... but now... why does it feel so much more satisfying to help a little girl with her research and experiments...? Please tell Keeny that she'll be always welcome to ask questions.
Hmm... you must have other things to take care of. Please drop by if you have time...

Hey there! Good to see you again! Did you ever get to meet up with Yulete? Wait, what is this? Oh wow... is this the blueprint for Frankenroid? This is amazing! Thank you, traveler! You really did meet Yulete!

Wow... just looking over the blueprint, I could tell how detailed and complicated this Roid really is... Yulete must have been an incredible alchemist! And he's generous with his work too... I'll have to pay a visit to him someday and Say thanks to him in person.

And thank you so much, traveler, for all your help! I mean, you already helped me out so many times... seriously, thanks! Keeny will really start working hard on her research and succeed in her experiment for Humanoid A, and for you!

Have you not gone to see Keeny yet? I'm sure she's waiting for you... I suggest you go see her now! I wonder how she'll react to seeing the blueprint... hahaha, it feels like I just found myself a student.
You haven't seen #bYulete#k yet? Hmm... I know that many people Say bad things about him, but Keeny believes that he's not that bad of a person.

Hmm...? You lost the blueprint of Frankenroid? Oh now... Keeny would have loved to get her hands on it. Good thing I have some extra blueprints in the lab. Here, take this one, and please give this to Keeny.
